Literature.Title: Small, anionic, and charge-neutralizing propeptide fragments of zymogens are antimicrobial.
Literature.Author: Brogden KA, Ackermann M, Huttner KM

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Mannheimia haemolytica 82-25(MIC=230±20µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 12795(MIC=850±120µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 10031(MIC=900±80µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27312(MIC=1500µM),Serratia marcescens ATCC 14756(MIC=1500µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=1800±170µM),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=1800±170µM),Candida krusei ATCC 6258(MIC=>5110µM)
